## hpr1798 :: Machine learning and service robots.

 
Link to the videos of the crawling robots: https://iki.hs-weingarten.de/?lang=eng&page=p_crawler


Link to the general Ravensburg-Weingarten University of Applied Sciences page, where you can also find videos of the service robots "Kate" and "Marvin":
